page.title: 08HARESCOMBE
page.content: In the parish of{Harescombe}there are approximately 200 people. There are 6 farms, a village hall and a Women's Institute. This Institute organises entertainment for the village. At Styles Farm there is dairy farming in pastures, together with a few horses. There are no shops or Post Office in Harescombe and there never have been. Villagers unable to travel usually arrange for an appointed member of the communtiy to collect their weekly pension for them from Stroud. The only deliveries are daily post and milk, except on Sundays. Villagers say of this area that there are more cows than inhabitants! In the village there are just 20 houses, varying from detached to older villas and cottages.
